description: Bug hunt: fix degenerate spawn placement, eliminate MSVC C4127 constant-condition warnings without pragmas, and clean up unsafe vector erase casts.
summary: Spawn safety: randomFreeTileInRoom() now has robust fallback logic (global random + full-map scan) so degenerate rooms cannot place monsters/items inside walls or on occupied tiles.
Warnings: replace constant-condition branches in hallucination helpers and hallucination phantom rendering with static_assert guards, removing MSVC C4127 without disabling warnings.
Warnings/robustness: fix size_t->long iterator math in inventory ground-item erases by using std::vector<>::difference_type casts.
